Tourism Sri Lanka 2020 - June
TOURIST ACCOMMODATION
REGISTERED ACCOMMODATION ESTABLISHMENTS
column5:
The  total  number  of  SLTDA  registered 
accommodation  establishments  as  at 
30th June 2020 was 2,895.
The number of classified tourist hotels
was 156 and among them 25 were five
star hotels.

The  presence  of  small  and  medium 
enterprises is strong with guest houses, 
homestays  and  bungalows  recording 
the highest number of registered estab-
lishments   with   1,099,   725   and   493
respectively.
